body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Thomas Mitchell and the customer's name is Dorothy Peterson.  The conversation is about Old Stone Stocks (a Brokerage Company ) and is a conversation about privacy.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! My name is Sarah, and I am a customer service agent with Home Solutions Company.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Sarah, nice to meet you!

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: It's great to meet you too! May I please have your name so I can assist you better?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my name is John Smith.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, John! Could you provide me with your email address, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you! Now, for verification purposes, could you please tell me your date of birth?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, I was born on June fourth, nineteen eighty-five.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, John. That helps a lot! Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all for now. Thank you for your help!

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're very welcome, John! Thank you for your time, and have a great day!
